page.title: 16ENTERTAINMENTS
page.content: The Village Hall in {Chacewater }was once a {Church Hall.}It was in a poor state of repair.{Chacewater Players is a group of people who act out pantomimes and summer shows.The first show was {Dick Whittington}which was performed in January 1979,although they started in September 1978. They have performed 13 pantomimes and summer shows .They rehearse and do the actual show in {Chacewater Village {Hall}which will hold 150 people. {Chacewater Bowling Club}has been in existence for almost all of this century.It is available to members {seven}days a week.There is membership of over{50}playing members from as far as{Camborne.}It is a very successful club in terms of achievement,both sporting and in improving facilities. The lawn is mowed{3}or more times a week.
